name: Pac Man Expansion
description:
Warning: This game Has Flashing Lights   

Controls are on the screen   

extra controls  -click Pac-Man to restart if you get stuck -z to use your pac booster if on -Space to Jump 

Its pac man, but with settings: more ghosts, power-ups from Arrangement, and skills from Pac Mania, and Super Pac Man 

Pac man and Ms.Pac Man Have Different Abilities when Jumping is inabled

 Pac man- Has your jump from Pac Mania, can't Collect Dots in the air but can Jump over Ghosts, Has no cool-down

Ms. Pac Man- She has the Spin-Dash (not from Sonic) She can start to spin and will go faster when spinning. Can Eat Dots and Go though Ghost, has a Cool-Down for 3 seconds. 

Credits are here https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/731062800/
